items.title: GM Flubbed a Recall, Now It’s Facing a Massive Lawsuit
items.description: The company’s fix allegedly didn’t solve the problem, and customers are not happy.

items.title: How Much Water Does AI Actually Use? Depends Who You Ask.
items.description: Every time ChatGPT is tasked to write an essay or Claude is asked for help with vibe coding, water is being used. How much exactly?

items.title: A Baby Was Born in a San Francisco Waymo—and It Wasn’t Even the First
items.description: An expecting mother gave birth in a Waymo this week on the way to a San Francisco hospital in a rare, but not unprecedented, event.

items.title: Stop Treating Nonprofits as Charities
items.description: The nonprofit crisis is a call to start funding them as essential infrastructure.

items.title: Klarna Takes on Amex Platinum and Chase Sapphire with Premium Perks That Don’t Require a Credit Card
items.description: The Swedish fintech’s new tiers offer luxury travel perks, lounge access, cash back, and subscriptions as more Americans shift toward BNPL.
